title: Chapter 1453 - Single-Handedly Transforming The Human Realm
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1453 - Single-Handedly Transforming The Human Realm

Mi Zhen’s figure was battered and broken. The blood sword had dealt him a massive blow, suppressing him atop the River of Spacetime!

Even Su Yi was unwittingly stunned. She’s… actually so ferocious?

“Daoist Brother, that guy is no more than one of the Dipankara Buddha’s dogs. Back then, you could have eradicated him with a single thought,” sighed Luo Yao.

It seemed she’d realized that Su Yi had yet to regain his memories of their time together, and her blood-red eyes shone with a hint of melancholy.

“That so…?” Su Yi rubbed his nose, feeling a bit strange.

Mi Zhen’s expression filled with dread. He hissed, “Don’t tell me you’ve forgotten how the gods worked together to hunt you down!?”

The woman stretched out her finger and tapped the air.

Boom!

Murderous intent exploded from the blood sword, rising into the firmament and grinding Mi Zhen into nothingness.

Just like that, a divine attendant had been killed!

But the woman acted as if she’d done something too trivial even to be worth mentioning. She beckoned, and the blood sword transformed into a beam of light and landed in her palm. She then placed it on her back.

“Senior! Senior,...
original_title: Chapter 1453 - Single-Handedly Transforming the Human Realm
